General.Name: Hanson International Tbk
General.Description: PT Hanson International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of real estate properties in Indonesia. It develops residential, commercial, shop house, and office properties. The company was formerly known as PT Hanson Industri Utama Tbk. PT Hanson International Tbk was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
